0: v.tenonto = 0.0; for_each(t.tenontosaurus, query.get_nearby_entities_except_self(12, 'rift:tenontosaurus'), { v.tenonto = v.tenonto + !(t.tenontosaurus -> query.is_tamed); }); return v.tenonto > 0.0;

v.hypnotized = 0.0; for_each(t.hypno, query.get_nearby_entities_except_self(16), { v.hypnotized = v.hypnotized + (!(t.hypno -> query.is_tamed) && (t.hypno -> query.property('rift:is_hypnotized'))); }); return v.hypnotized > 0.0;
